TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XsltContext extends System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager
Public MustInherit Class XsltContext Inherits XmlNamespaceManager
public ref class XsltContext abstract : System::Xml::XmlNamespaceManager

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the current execution context of the Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT) processor allowing XML Path Language (XPath) to resolve functions, parameters, and namespaces within XPath expressions.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int CompareDocument (string baseUri, string nextbaseUri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareDocument(string baseUri, string nextbaseUri) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CompareDocument (baseUri As String, nextbaseUri As String) As Integer
public: abstract int CompareDocument(System::String ^ baseUri, System::String ^ nextbaseUri);
abstract member CompareDocument : string * string -> int

Docs.param: The base URI of the first document to compare.
The base URI of the second document to compare.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor (that is, the class).
Docs.returns: An integer value describing the relative order of the two base URIs: -1 if occurs before ; 0 if the two base URIs are identical; and 1 if occurs after .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method supports the XSLT `document()` function which specifies that nodes selected across multiple documents are always returned in the same order.
> [!NOTE] > The order is implementation-specific.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool PreserveWhitespace (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator node);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool PreserveWhitespace(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator node) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function PreserveWhitespace (node As XPathNavigator) As Boolean
public: abstract bool PreserveWhitespace(System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ node);
abstract member PreserveWhitespace : System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator -> bool

Docs.param: The white space node that is to be preserved or stripped in the current context.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, evaluates whether to preserve white space nodes or strip them for the given context.
Docs.returns: Returns if the white space is to be preserved or if the white space is to be stripped.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction ResolveFunction (string prefix, string name, System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] ArgTypes);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction ResolveFunction(string prefix, string name, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] ArgTypes) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveFunction (prefix As String, name As String, ArgTypes As XPathResultType()) As IXsltContextFunction
public: abstract System::Xml::Xsl::IXsltContextFunction ^ ResolveFunction(System::String ^ prefix, System::String ^ name, cli::array <System::Xml::XPath::XPathResultType> ^ ArgTypes);
abstract member ResolveFunction : string * string * System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] -> System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction

Docs.param: The prefix of the function as it appears in the XPath expression.
An array of argument types for the function being resolved. This allows you to select between methods with the same name (for example, overloaded methods).
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, resolves a function reference and returns an representing the function. The is used at execution time to get the return value of the function.

Docs.param: The prefix of the variable as it appears in the XPath expression.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, resolves a variable reference and returns an representing the variable.
Docs.returns: An representing the variable at runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> is used at execution time to get the value of the variable.

Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Whitespace As Boolean

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether to include white space nodes in the output.
Docs.value: to check white space nodes in the source document for inclusion in the output; to not evaluate white space nodes. The default is .
